min_length: Length of "{{name}}" must be more than {{param.0}}
max_length: Length of "{{name}}" must be less than {{param.0}}
valid_email: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid email adress
alpha_numeric: Field "{{name}}" can contains either a letters or a digits
alpha_dash: Field "{{name}}" can contains either a letters, numbers, underscores and the minus
numeric: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid numeric
integer: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid integer
decimal: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid decimal
is_natural_no_zero: Field "{{name}}" must be natural and not zero
valid_base64: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid base64
valid_url: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid url
valid_date: Field "{{name}}" must be a valid date
